## Protocol.Emulation.SetDeviceMetricsOverrideRequest.dontSetVisibleSize property

Do not set visible view size, rely upon explicit setVisibleSize call.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dontSetVisibleSize?: boolean;
```
